name: api_rendering_MeshFilter
description: A class to access the Mesh of the mesh filter.

properties.name: mesh
properties.description: Returns either a new mesh or a duplicate of the existing mesh, and assigns it to the mesh filter.

properties.name: sharedMesh
properties.description: Returns the shared mesh of the mesh filter.

properties.name: BroadcastMessage
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object or any of its children.

properties.name: CompareTag
properties.description: Checks the GameObject's tag against the defined tag.

properties.name: GetComponent
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified.

properties.name: GetComponentInChildren
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, or any child of the GameObject.

properties.name: GetComponentIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the component on its parent GameObject.

properties.name: GetComponentInParent
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, or any parent of the GameObject.

properties.name: GetComponents
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified.

properties.name: GetComponentsInChildren
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, and any child of the GameObject.

properties.name: GetComponentsInParent
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, and any parent of the GameObject.

properties.name: SendMessage
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object.

properties.name: SendMessageUpwards
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object and on every ancestor of the behaviour.

properties.name: TryGetComponent
properties.description: Gets the component of the specified type, if it exists.

properties.name: GetInstanceID
properties.description: Gets the instance ID of the object.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns the name of the object.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.
